development: a process in which something passes by degrees to a different stage (especially a more advanced or mature stage); 'the development of his ideas took many years'; 'the evolution of Greek civilization'; 'the slow development of her skill as a writer' <i107495>

senses.definition: a character development process that describes a person who is initially cold and even hostile towards another person before gradually showing a warmer side over time. [Wikipedia]
